title: 286 - MFM Guest Host Picks #9: Bridger Winegar
description:
This summer, Exactly Right family members will be guest hosting My Favorite Murder! Each week a guest host will pick their favorite stories from Karen and Georgia.

Today's episode is hosted by Bridger Winegar, host of I Said No Gifts! on Exactly Right. Bridger covers The Murders of Master Forger Mark Hofmann (Episode 76) and The Sleepwalking Murderer (Episode 160).
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
